properties.label: JIRA Instance URL
properties.description: URL of the current Jira Instance

properties.label: password
properties.description: Password for username e.g. secrets.TOKEN, Secrets can be used to reference encrypted authentication credentials in Connectors. See the Secrets documentation for more details.

properties.description: List of labels of the issue

properties.description: Start Date of the project issue (yyyy-mm-dd)

properties.description: Due Date of the project issue (yyyy-mm-dd)

properties.label: Reporter Account ID
properties.description: Account Id of the issue reporter

properties.label: Attachments
properties.description: List of File Attachments of the Issue

properties.label: Required Fields
properties.description: Fields to be retrieved from the issue

properties.label: Exclude Fields
properties.description: Fields to be excluded from the issue

properties.label: Expand
properties.description: List of attributes to be expanded E.g., renderedFields, names, schema, operations, editmeta, changelog, versionedRepresentations

properties.label: Board Name
properties.description: Name of the board to be retrieved

properties.label: Board Type
properties.description: List of types of the boards to be retrieved

properties.label: Result Variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result Expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error Expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.
